MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Northop Hall affecting properties in Pinfold Lane, Chester Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 6:24am. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of the extent of work required on an underground cable on Chester Road and our team are working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:39am on 4th February 2021.
